item.description:
The Roadhouse Cafe is the Highest Rated Restaurant on the Cape and Islands by the Phantom Gourmet.  Located at 488 South Street in the heart of Hyannis, is recognized as one of Cape Cod’s premiere restaurants. The key for the Roadhouse Cafe has been to consistently provide superior food, service and ambiance to both locals and visitors alike.

Music at the Roadhouse Cafe Cape Cod

The Roadhouse Cafe comes alive every Monday Night with the world famous Lou Colombo Jazz Ensemble. Join Lou and all the players in the Back Door Bistro for the liveliest brand of music on the East Coast. Enjoy dinner from the regular menu or the Bistro Lighter Fare. It’s an evening you won’t soon forget.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lounge and will be wearing my Girls Just Wanna Have Fun name tag!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Last Minute Meetup: Light bites and Music in the Lounge at the Road House Cafe
